TopicTitle: Ok Squad, you've managed to kick my OCD into high gear!

Articles.Content:
Prior to 1.0, during a flight you have 4 buttons in the top right corner. Going from left to right, they are the "Funds/Rep/Science" button, the "Resources" button, the "Contracts" button and the "Messages" button.

In 1.0, however, you changed the order. Now going left to right they are: ""Funds/Rep/Science" button, "Contracts" button, "Resources" button, and "Messages" button.

You flipped the "Resources" and "Contracts" button so now every time I instinctively go to hit "Resources", I bring up the stuipd contracts list instead. OCD in full on rage mode! LOL.

yeah, and also when you get new "contract accomplished" messages , the messages button expands and hides the resources button. OCD inducing too huh ?

(the thing is, it would/it used to fit when the buttons were in the previous order because the contracts button is thinner.)
